weeks.title: Data acquisition & preprocessing
weeks.objective: Begin data acquisition and preprocessing for financial statement analysis using Bloomberg data, aiming to build a clean dataset for quantitative modeling.

sections.heading: Data Access Challenges
bullets: Attempted to use the Bloomberg API from the university lab.
Issue: ITS policy blocked Python installs and external device connections.
Workaround: Exported financial statements and key indices from the Bloomberg Terminal as Excel (.xlsx) files.

sections.heading: File Compatibility
bullets: Excel/Sheets errored due to BDH formulas requiring an active Bloomberg terminal.
Converted to Apple Numbers (.numbers), which preserved the last recorded values as a static snapshot.

sections.heading: Parsing & Extraction
bullets: Used a Numbers parser from GitHub to read .numbers in Python.
Initial parse produced a messy Pandas DataFrame (headers/index misaligned).
Fix: Transposed the DataFrame to obtain a clearer structure.

next_steps: Standardize a preprocessing pipeline from .numbers âžœ Pandas.
Clean and normalize headers, datatypes, and index across files.
Begin exploratory analysis once structure is stable.
